paragraph: Vernon and Petunia , with their one-year-old son Dudley , are proud to say that they are the most normal people possible .
They happily occupy  Privet , located in the Surrey town of Little Whinging .

Vernon is the director of a drill company called Grunnings , while Petunia does housework and looks after Dudley , yet she always spends so much time craning over garden fence to spy on the neighbours .

Despite all this , Lestrange-Marjorie-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Petunia-Roberts-Vernon-Potter-Dudley-Dursley are the least people anyone expects to be involved in anything funny or disturbing , for Lestrange-Marjorie-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Petunia-Roberts-Vernon-Potter-Dudley-Dursley do n't hold with such nonsense in Lestrange-Marjorie-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Petunia-Roberts-Vernon-Potter-Dudley-Dursley 's daily lives . The story begins on a Tuesday  November ,  , where many absurd things happen . When Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley are gossiping happily at breakfast trying to wrestle Dudley in Vernon 's high chair , none of Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley even notice a large tawny owl flutter pass Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley 's window .
It eventually comes to Vernon 's attention when he is heading to work shortly afterwards , and sees a silver tabby cat reading a map and later a street sign .
He attempts to convince himself that these are merely coincidences .
Next , he sees people in cloaks talking in hushed voices , and while he is sitting in his office , a flock of owls fly past his window .
On his break , Vernon goes to a bakery to get a bun and sees another group of extravagantly-cloaked figures .
Even though they are speaking in hushed voices , Harry eavesdrops on some of their conversation , which includes a mention of `` Harry-James-Campaign-Ginevra and their son Harry . ''

Vernon finds this horrifying , because Harry-James-Campaign-Ginevra are the family of Petunia 's sister Lily . Harry and Petunia will be embarrassed if people find out that they are related to them , as Lestrange-Harry-Peverell-James-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Campaign-Dursley-Ginevra are very strange , in their opinion .

When he leaves his workplace at the end of the day , he bumps into a very small , cloaked man , who tells him that someone named `` You-Know-Who '' has been defeated , and that even Muggles like Vernon should be celebrating .
Vernon does n't know what a Muggle is , but is offended that the man called him one .

That night , when Vernon arrives at home , he turns on the news and becomes suspicious when the newsman states that owls have been seen everywhere earlier in the day , and that fireworks have been spotted in Kent .
Vernon asks Petunia if she and her sister have been in touch , but she becomes angry and denies it as she does not like to talk about her .
When Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley go to bed , a long bearded old man in a purple cloak appears out of nowhere outside of their home .

The man , Albus , syphons all of the light from the street lamps with his Deluminator , then meets with the cat that Vernon had seen earlier that morning , who transforms into a whisky old woman named Minerva .

They quietly speak about the deaths of James and Lily Potter at the hands of someone called `` Tom '' at the Potter cottage in the West village of Godric 's Hollow , and how their son Harry has miraculously survived the attack . A few moments later , a motorbike with a gigantic man , Rubeus , riding it lands right in front of them , carrying baby Harry .
He hands him over to Albus , who leaves the sleeping baby and a letter to Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley on the doorstep of  Privet .
Rubeus himself leaves to bring the motorbike back to its actual owner , but not before giving Harry a kiss goodbye on the scarred forehead -LRB- which burns his lips -RRB- .

Minerva reverts back into the cat and slinks around the corner at the other end of the street , but Albus stays to unsyphon the the light from the street lamps and bid Harry farewell before vanishing without a trace .

Harry rolls over inside his bundle of blankets with his small hand closing on the letter as he sleeps on , not knowing he is special and famous , nor that he will be woken up the next morning by his Petunia 's scream when she opens the front door to put out the milk bottles , nor that he will be spending the next few weeks being prodded and pinch by his cousin Dudley .

And he will never know that at this very moment , people meeting in secret all over the country are holding up glasses and saying in hushed voices : `` To Harry -- the boy who lived ! '' Ten years pass since Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley have awoken to find Harry lying on their doorstep , and Privet and Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley 's house has not changed since that day .
The only difference is the vast number of pictures of Dudley throughout his life . There is no sign that Harry lives there , however , in the Cupboard Under the Stairs , Harry .
Petunia comes to his door and wakes him with a shrill voice .
Harry is trying to think about the dream he had been having . It was about a flying motorbike , and he thinks he has had the same dream before .
Petunia tells him to make some bacon , as she wants everything perfect for Dudley 's th birthday .
Harry dresses into a pair of Dudley 's old clothes , and goes into the kitchen , where the table is covered in Dudley 's presents .
Harry has jet-black hair and green eyes .
His glasses are held together by tape because Dudley has smashed them so many times .
The thing that distinguishes Harry from others the most is the lightning-shaped scar on his forehead .
He often wonders how he got it and Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley have told him that he got it from the car crash that killed Harry 's parents .
Harry does n't know much more about the accident though because Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley 's first rule is to not ask questions .

Dudley comes in to the kitchen and begins to count his presents , only to find  , which he angrily recalls is one fewer than the year before . Petunia states that they are going to buy him two new presents while they are out . Vernon tells Petunia that Arabella , their next-door neighbour , has broken her leg and can not take care of Harry while they are at the Zoo . They can't think of anyone else who can take care of him , so Harry has to go with them . Dudley is allowed to take a friend to the Zoo and chooses his friend Piers .

Piers comes to the house with his mother . A half-hour later , Harry sits in the car with Dudley , Piers , Vernon and Petunia . On the way , a motorbike overtakes them and Vernon complains about them .
Harry explains that he had a dream about a flying motorbike once and Vernon snappily reminds him that motorbikes do not fly .

Harry thinks about all the strange things that have happened to him : He once turned his teacher 's wig blue , jumped onto the school chimney , and grew all of his hair back the morning after a haircut .
At the zoo , Dudley and Piers find the animals boring .
Harry is left to watch a Boa constrictor as it sleeps and , when Dudley tries to make it move , it wakes up but still does n't move .

The snake begins to move after Dudley and Piers slink away . Moments later , Harry speaks to the snake and finds that it miraculously understands him . Piers calls Dudley and Vernon back to the snake 's exhibit upon realising that it is now moving . Dudley pushes Harry out of the way and presses his face against the glass . Harry becomes angry and somehow the glass vanishes and the snake gets out scaring Dudley and Piers . As the snake slithers away , Harry thinks that he hears it speak back to him . Vernon blames Harry for what happened and sends him to his cupboard -- with no meals for a week as punishment . Ever since the boa constrictor escaped from the zoo , and Vernon blamed it on Harry , he was locked in his cupboard for the longest time ever . When Harry is finally allowed out , it 's the beginning of the summer holidays . Even though he is not at school , Harry still ca n't escape Dudley and his gang , who regularly visit the house . To keep out of their way , Harry usually wanders around Privet .
He is glad , however , that Dudley and Piers are going to Smeltings , while Harry is going to attend Stonewall . One day during the summer , Harry is told to get the post for Vernon .
When Harry goes to get the mail , there are three letters : a postcard from Vernon 's sister , who is on holiday in the Isle of Wight , a letter that looks like a bill , and a letter for Harry .

Harry takes the letter , studies the yellow parchment it is made of , then reads the address : Harry ca n't believe it . He has never had a letter in his life . On the back there is a wax seal with a Gryffindor , Snake , Badger and Eagle surrounding an H. Harry returns to the kitchen and gives Vernon the other two letters as he sits down and starts to open the letter . Dudley soon sees that Harry has a letter and Vernon snatches it from him to read with Petunia . Vernon tells Harry and Dudley to get out of the kitchen , so they both go and stand in the hall .
The two fight over who gets to look through the keyhole . Dudley wins , so Harry resorts to looking through the gap between the floor and the door .
Vernon and Petunia are discussing the seal on the back . Vernon says that they should just ignore it .

Later , when Harry is in his cupboard , Vernon comes in and says that he has burned the letter , and that they are moving him up to Dudley 's second bedroom . Slightly surprised , Harry moves all of his things up to the bedroom , wishing he had his letter .
The next morning at breakfast , Dudley is asked to get the post by Vernon .

After banging things all the way down the hall with his Smeltings stick , Dudley calls out that there is another letter addressed to Harry , this time in '' ` The Smallest Bedroom '' ' , rather than '' ` The Cupboard Under the Stairs '' ' . Both Harry and Vernon rush to the hallway in an attempt to get the letter . After a minute of confused fighting , Vernon emerges clutching the letter in his hand .

Determined to see what his letter says , Harry creeps down the stairs early the next morning and approaches the door . He is going to camp there until the post arrives , then he will finally get to read his letter . When he reaches the door , however , he stands on Vernon - who had the very same idea .
Every day , letters appear addressed to Harry , and they are doubling in number .
Eventually , there are so many letters arriving that Vernon resorts to nailing shut the letter box .

But they begin to appear in the strangest of places : under the door , squeezed through the window , and Petunia even finds some while cracking open eggs . Finally , they get attacked by thirty or forty letters being fired out of the fireplace .
Despite the sender 's efforts , Harry still does not manage to get his hands on one of the letters for long enough to read it and a furious Vernon states that they are leaving the house .
They get into their car and leave ten minutes later . They travel for miles until they eventually stop in front of a gloomy hotel on the brink of the city .
Vernon 's attempt to shake the sender off are not successful , however , as more letters come for Harry to the hotel the very next morning .
Again , they get back in the car and finally stop get on a boat that takes them to an island with a small hut on it .
Harry remembers that the next day will be his eleventh birthday .
When they get there , Harry ca n't sleep with the raging storm outside , so he counts down the time until his birthday .

When his watch turns to the next day , there is a loud knocking at the door - something wants to get in ... There is another loud boom on the door and Dudley wakes up , thinking it is a cannon . Vernon comes through with a rifle , with Petunia cowering behind him .

The door is blasted off its hinges and hits the floor . A giant enters and fixes the door into its frame . The giant asks for a cup of coffee then sits on the couch next to Dudley , scaring him away to hide behind Petunia . The giant turns his eyes to Harry and greets him , saying he has n't seen him since he was a baby . He says Harry looks like his father but has his mother 's eyes . Vernon tells him to leave but the giant merely grabs the gun , ties into a knot and throws it away . The giant presents Harry with a birthday cake . Harry asks the giant who he is and he says he is Rubeus , the Keeper of Keys and Grounds at Hogwarts of Witchcraft and Wizardry .
Rubeus makes a fire and cooks some sausages , but is shocked that Harry knows nothing about Hogwarts .
He gets angry at Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley for not telling him anything about his parents ' world , his world .
Harry has no idea what 's going on .

Rubeus tells Harry his parents are famous and that he 's a wizard , despite Vernon forbidding him to . Rubeus gives Harry the letter that he has been craving for . It tells him that he has been accepted into Hogwarts of Witchcraft and Wizardry , and that term begins on st September . Rubeus takes out parchment and a quill and writes a letter to Hogwarts , explaining he has given Harry the letter . Vernon tells Rubeus that Harry wo n't be going , but the giant knows that a great Muggle like him would n't be able to stop Harry from going to Hogwarts . Vernon reveals he knew that Harry 's a wizard , and Petunia tells Harry that her sister , Harry 's mother , was a witch . Petunia said they were killed by another wizard and Harry screams that Petunia said they got killed in a car crash .

Rubeus is as outraged as Harry is that Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley have lied that much . He sits down and tells Harry that a Dark Wizard named Tom killed Harry 's parents and tried to kill Harry too .
But the spell he used backfired , only leaving Harry his scar .

Rubeus tells him that he brought Harry from the ruins of the house and brought him to Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley 's house on  Privet . Vernon says it 's a load of rubbish and tries to persuade Harry that whatever happened to his parents was deserved anyway , but Rubeus pulls an umbrella out of his coat and threatens Vernon .

Harry asks what happened to Tom and Rubeus tells him he vanished and has n't been seen since . Harry doubts that he is a wizard until Rubeus asks him if he ever made anything happen he could n't explain when he was angry or scared .
Vernon makes the mistake of mocking Albus and Rubeus swishes the umbrella , in Dudley 's direction , and Dudley sprouts a curly pig 's tail .
Rubeus asks Harry not to mention it at Hogwarts because Rubeus is n't allowed to do magic , as he had been expelled .
Rubeus takes off his coat and Harry sleeps under that for the night , for the day ahead .

When Harry wakes the next morning , he tries to tell himself that what happened the previous night had all been a dream and that Rubeus taking him to a school for Wizards called Hogwarts of Witchcraft and Wizardry has never happened .
But when he opens his eyes , Rubeus had fallen asleep on the couch and he finds that it has all happened .
He hears a tapping noise coming from the window and lets in an Owl .
The owl drops a newspaper on Rubeus 's lap and begins to claw Rubeus 's coat . Rubeus tells Harry to pay the owl so Harry does what he says and the owl leaves .

Rubeus tells him they have to go and buy his things , but Harry worries because he has n't got any money . Rubeus tells him his parents did n't leave him without money and that their first stop is Gringotts , the wizard 's bank .
He explains that it is run by Goblins and that `` you 'd be mad to try and rob it '' . Rubeus says Albus also needs something from Gringotts , so Rubeus has to go get it .
They step outside the hut and step into their boat .
Rubeus uses a bit of magic to speed things up for them .
Rubeus says there are Charm guarding the vaults in Gringotts .
Gringotts is all under London , and you would die of starvation trying to get out .
Hagrid begins to read the Daily Prophet and mutters that the Ministry of Magic is messing things up as usual .
Harry wonders what the Ministry of Magic does , and Rubeus explains that they handle everything to do with magic .
He says they wanted Albus for Minister , but Cornelius got the job .
As they pass through London , people stared at Rubeus a lot , due to his size and that he is pointing out things that Muggles are brilliant for inventing .
Harry asks if there are Dragons guarding Gringotts .
Rubeus says yes and mutters that he would like a dragon .
Harry takes out his list and reads it out .
It says he needs a set of robes , a pointed hat , Dragon hide gloves , and a winter coat .
There is a list of his books and stationary equipment .
Hagrid leads them both into a pub called the The that Harry did not notice was there .
It is dark and shabby and everyone greets Rubeus as he enters .

When people see Harry , many get up and shake his hand , including Doris and Dedalus . A man with a turban approaches them and Rubeus introduces Harry to Quirinus , the Defence Against the Dark Arts professor at Hogwarts . They talk for a bit then Rubeus steers them out a back door into a small enclosed area with a few barrels .
Rubeus takes out his umbrella and taps bricks with it , counting an order .

Once he is done , a hole appears in the brick wall , slowly getting bigger , until the wall disappears fully , revealing a crowded street with people wearing robes everywhere with shops left and right . Rubeus tells Harry the street is called Diagon . When they are walking down the street , Harry is trying to look everywhere around him , taking in as much as possible .
At the end of Diagon , there is a snowy white building , huge in size : Gringotts . As they enter , a warning echoes through telling them rob at your own risk .
Harry and Rubeus go up to a Goblin and explain they need to take some money out of Harry 's vault . The Goblin asks for Harry 's key and Rubeus presents it , after sorting through many other keys .
The Goblin calls upon another Goblin named Griphook to take them down to the vault .
Rubeus also states they need to be taken down to remove the You-Know-What in Vault  .

Griphook takes them to Vault in question , and Rubeus removes the grubby little package there but ca n't tell Harry what it is . Griphook then takes them to Harry 's vault , where there is a large amount of money piled up there that Harry owns .
There are Bronze Knuts , Silver Sickles , and Gold Galleons .
Harry and Rubeus take a bit of the money for Harry 's list , then leave Gringotts . Rubeus has to stand for a bit as the cart rides that takes them to the vaults make him sick .
Rubeus decides they get Harry 's uniform first so they enter Mary 's Robes for all Occasions .
Mary measures him then he sits on a chair next to a pale-faced boy getting his robes .
The boy starts to talk about smuggling a Broomstick into Hogwarts somehow , then about something called Quidditch .
Harry feels very out of place with him , as he is talking about houses called Slytherin and Hufflepuff .
The boy points out Rubeus then says the other kind should n't be allowed in .
When Harry leaves , he tells Rubeus and Rubeus says there are four houses at Hogwarts , Quidditch is a game played on Broomsticks and then leave to buy Harry the rest of his things .

All Harry has left is his wand , so he and Rubeus enter Ollivanders , a Wand shop . Mr comes round , scaring them both , and greeting Harry and Rubeus . Ollivander begins to talk about Harry 's parents ' wands , and how he remembers selling them .

Ollivander touches Harry 's scar and apologises for the fact that he sold the wand that caused it . Ollivander gives Harry a wand and tells him to give it a wave . Harry did so , but it is n't suitable for him , so Ollivander takes it back .
Harry tries many wands , but none of them seem to work well enough for him .
Eventually , he picks up a wand and he feels warmth in his fingers .

Ollivander states that it is very curious that Harry should be destined for that wand when its brother gave Harry his scar . Rubeus takes Harry to get something to eat in the Muggle world but Harry is worried that he is n't going to fit in at Hogwarts as everyone expects great things from him .

For Harry 's birthday , Rubeus buys Harry an snowy owl named Hedwig . Rubeus provides Harry with a train ticket , giving him the date , time , and location to catch the Hogwarts and tells Harry that if he ever needs anything , he is to write a letter , and Hedwig will know where to find him .
Harry then catches a train back to Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley .

Harry 's last month with Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley is unpleasant . Despite how furious his aunt and uncle are after he found out about his wizard heritage , they hardly speak to him and instead pretend that Harry is n't even were they see he is . At first it was an upgrade , but then becomes depressing for Harry after a while , and Dudley has become so scared of his cousin that he refuses to be anywhere near him . Above all that , Harry is allowed to keep the smallest bedroom with only Hedwig and his new school books as company .

He would lay on is bed and read through the interesting books late at night with Hedwig swooping in and out of the window as she pleases , bringing back dead mice that she leaves lying around the room to make them the main reason Petunia avoids coming in to vacuum .

The day before he is due to leave , Harry asks Vernon to take him to the King 's Cross station . Vernon agrees to take him but ridicules him for saying he is to leave from Platform Nine and Three-Quarters , as is marked on the ticket Rubeus gave him .
The following day , Harry arrives at the station and stands between platforms nine and ten , wondering how to find platform nine and three quarters .
Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley leave Vernon , and as they pulled away in their car , started laughing , leaving Harry quite stumped .
Finally , he overhears some people mention Hogwarts of Witchcraft and Wizardry ; it is a family of red-haired children who seem to be bound for the school .
He asks the mother for help , and she tells him to run through the barrier between platforms nine and ten .
Harry does so , and he is astonished to find the train to Hogwarts on the other side of the station .

Harry , then , boards the Hogwarts . On the train , Harry is introduced to Fred and George , twins who are returning to school for their third year , and to their younger brother Ronald , another student who will be starting at Hogwarts . They have another brother , Percy , who is returning for his fifth year as a Prefect , and there are two elder Weasley brothers who have already left school .

Lestrange-Fred-Peverell-Angelina-Percy-Ronald-Riddle-Fleur-Weasley-Malfoy-George-Roberts-Molly-Potter-Charles-Dursley-Arthur-William is poor , and Ronald can not afford the pastries sold on the train , so Harry buys a lot with his newfound wealth and shares them with Ronald . Ronald introduces Harry to such details of wizard life as Quidditch , Famous Witches and Wizards cards , and Bertie Bott 's Every Flavour Beans .
One of the cards bears the picture of Albus .

Harry also meets a somewhat annoying , overachieving girl named Hermione and sees again the unpleasant boy from the uniform shop , whose name is Draco , this time with his buddies , Vincent and Gregory .
After Draco makes some rude comments about Ronald , Harry rejects Draco 's offer to advise him about associating with the right kind of wizards .
All the students have heard of Harry , and Harry is not sure how to respond to his fame .

Arriving at the station , the newcomers are led by Rubeus onto boats which they sail to the castle of Hogwarts . The new students are greeted at the castle door by Minerva , who tells them they will soon be sorted into their houses .
All Hogwarts students live in one of four residences : Gryffindor , Hufflepuff , Ravenclaw , or Slytherin , with each house having its own team for Quidditch .

The houses are in a yearlong competition with one another to acquire the most points , which are earned by success in Quidditch games and given by teachers for academic achievement , and lost for student infractions , in order to win the House Cup awarded at the end of the year .
As the students enter Hogwarts , ghosts appear in the hallway . The students are led to the Great , where the entire school waits for them .
They see an old pointy hat on a stool .
When the students try on the Sorting Hat , it announces the house in which they are placed .
Harry becomes very nervous . He has learned that he does not care for Slytherin house , as the students in it are unpleasant and Tom once belonged to Slytherin .
The annoying girl Hermione from the train is Sorted into Gryffindor , much to Ronald 's displeasure .
Finally , it is Harry 's turn to wear the hat .

He quietly says to himself `` not Slytherin , not Slytherin ! '' After a brief mental discussion with the hat in which it tries to suggest Slytherin to him , the hat places Harry in Gryffindor . Harry is pleased to find that Ronald joins in Gryffindor with him .
Draco is placed in Slytherin .
Everyone sits down to a grand feast to begin the year . Harry is overwhelmed by the variety of luscious food served .

Walden , the resident ghost of Gryffindor -LRB- popularly known as Nearly Headless Nick because of a botched decapitation -RRB- , introduces himself to the first-year students and tells them he hopes they will win the house championship this year .

Over dessert , the discussion turns to the students ' upbringings . A student named Neville tells how Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley thought he was a Squib until he survived a fall from a window .
Another student , Seamus , talks about how his father , a Muggle , was shocked when he found out his wife -LRB- Seamus ' mother -RRB- was a witch .
Harry glances around the room and notices a few of the teachers talking to one another .
One of them , while speaking to Quirinus , stares malevolently at Harry , who immediately feels a sharp pain in his forehead scar .
Harry asks Percy the prefect who he is , and finds out that this man is Severus , who teaches Potions .
After dessert , Albus gets up to make his welcome speech .
He adds a few warnings about staying away from the Forbidden and avoiding the rd-floor corridor on the right side of the school before sending everyone off to bed in their Common rooms .
On the way , Godric-Gryffindor-Sword run into Peeves the Poltergeist and upon arriving , meet the The who lets them into Gryffindor after Percy gives her the password .
Harry has trouble sleeping due to dream he has .
In it , he is wearing Quirinus 's turban , which is demanding him to transfer to Slytherin .
He refuses , and the headwear becomes more heavier on his head .

Malfoy and Severus appear laughing at him , then the dream ends with a flash of green light that causes Harry to wake up at midnight and fall asleep again , forgetting about it immediately afterwards .
Harry finds life at Hogwarts unfamiliar and strange .
Everyone talks about him , and an adult always seems to be around when he is doing something wrong .
It is hard to find his way to classes due to the forty-two changing staircases and tricky doorways .

The people in the Hogwarts portraits have been no help to him , for they ignore some students and visit each other , nor have the ghosts , whom always scare Harry when they glide through a door he is trying to open .
Only Nearly-Headless Nick points new Gryffindors in the right direction , but Peeves is worth two locked doors and a tricky staircase whenever Harry runs into him when late for class .

Even worse than Peeves if anyhow possible is the school caretaker Argus , who both Harry and Ronald get on the bad side of on their very first morning , when he finds them trying to force their way through a door which turns out to be entance of the out-of-bounds third floor corridor . He threatens to lock them in the dungeons , but the two boys are luckily rescued by Quirrel , who is passing by .

All the classes become very interesting to Harry , with the only exception being History of Magic , and he learns that there is a lot more to magic other than waving his wand and saying a few funny words .

In his first Transfiguration class on Thursday , Minerva transfigures Minerva 's desk into a pig and then back again while explaining how Transfiguration itself is some of the most complex and dangerous magic to be learned , and anyone who will get caught messing around with it will have to banned from the class .
the entire class is very impressed , but soon realise that they are not gon na be changing furniture into animals .
Only Hermione is able to make any progress at turning a match into a needle , for which MacGonagall gives her a rare smile , but Harry is relieved to see that his peers are just as lost as he is .

When time comes to transition to Defence Against the Dark Arts class -LRB- the class everyone is looking forward to -RRB- every morning , the lesson turns into more of a joke , as Quirrel keeps going on with stories about his travels in the year prior , such as when he had ward off a vampire in Rom -LRB- whom he is afraid will come back and get him -RRB- , and when he had earned his turban from an African prince for saving him from a troublesome zombie .
During breakfast the first Friday , Hedwig arrives with a tea invitation from Rubeus .
Later , in his Potions class , Harry discovers that Professor Snape hates him , mocking Harry as `` our new celebrity '' and then humiliating Harry for his ignorance of potion-making materials .

Harry brings Ronald with him to Rubeus 's shack for tea . Harry and Ronald are disconcerted by Rubeus 's huge and fierce-looking dog , Fang , but discover that Rubeus is gentle . Rubeus tells Harry that Rubeus is overreacting to Severus 's treatment , asserting that Severus would have no reason to hate Rubeus .

Harry happens to notice an article from the wizard newspaper , the Daily Prophet , detailing a break-in that occurred at Gringotts bank in a vault that had been emptied earlier in the day . Rubeus realises that it happened on Rubeus 's birthday , the day Rubeus and Rubeus went to Gringotts .

Furthermore , Rubeus remembers that Rubeus emptied vault seven hundred and thirteen , taking a small package with Rubeus as Rubeus left . Harry leaves Rubeus 's , Rubeus 's mind filled with questions .
Harry has been at Hogwarts for around two weeks when he finds out that Godric-Gryffindor-Sword will have flying lessons with Slytherin-Salazar , much to his disliking .
Harry does not want to spend more time with Malfoy than he has to .
However , Harry finds that he is quite a natural at flying .
Mary leads the class , gently sending the new fliers off the ground .
Neville has an accident when his broom runs amok and breaks his wrist .
Mary takes him to the hospital , telling everyone to stay on the ground while she is away .
Malfoy notices a Remembrall belonging to Neville , picks it up , and begins to fly around with it .
Harry goes after Malfoy , who throws the ball in the air .

Harry catches it spectacularly and lands safely back on ground . Just then , Minerva arrives , reprimanding Harry and ordering him to follow her . But instead of punishing him , Minerva introduces him to Oliver , captain of the Gryffindor team , and makes him the Gryffindor team 's new Seeker . At dinner , Harry excitedly tells Ronald about joining the Quidditch team but tells him that Oliver wants it to be a secret . Malfoy comes over with his cronies Vincent and Gregory and teases Harry about getting in trouble earlier . The tension grows and Malfoy challenges Harry to a wizard 's duel .

Harry accepts , in spite of Hermione 's attempt to dissuade them from breaking the school rules . As Harry and Ronald sneak out later that night , Hermione tries to stop them but gets locked out of the dorm -LRB- the The has gone for an evening stroll -RRB- and must tag along . Neville also joins them , as he has forgotten the password to the common room and ended up sleeping on the floor outside .
They arrive at the Trophy Room , the site of the duel , but Malfoy is nowhere to be found .
Suddenly , they hear Argus and his cat , Mrs , enter the room . With it obvious that Malfoy tricked them , they begin to hide and then run away .

Not sure where they are going , they accidentally end up in the forbidden area on the third floor , staring at a large and scary three-headed dog . The children manage to get back to their dorm safely , though they are terrified .
Hermione reprimands Harry , but stirs his curiosity by pointing out that the dog was standing on a trapdoor .

The next morning , Harry and Ronald are discussing what the dog could be guarding when the mail arrives . Harry receives a Nimbus  , along with a note from Minerva summoning him to Quidditch practise .

Malfoy tells Harry that first-year students are not allowed broomsticks . Malfoy then tries to report Harry to Professor Flitwick who just expresses admiration for Harry 's talent having heard from Minerva .
Harry later meets Oliver to learn the basics of Quidditch , including the various positions on a standard Quidditch team and the implements used in the game .

Oliver explains Harry 's role as a Seeker : his job is to avoid other players and catch the Golden . A Quidditch game can not end until the Golden is caught , making the Seeker the most important player on a team .
On Hallowe'en , Filius begins teaching his students how to make things fly , using the Wingardium Leviosa spell .
Only Hermione succeeds ; Ronald , offended by her air of superiority , utters a nasty comment that Hermione overhears .
Harry notices her running off in tears .
Harry and Ronald arrive at the Hallowe'en feast to hear Quirinus , the teacher of Defence Against the Dark Arts , give a terrifying announcement about a twelve-foot troll in the building .

As the prefects lead the students back to their dorms , Harry realises that Hermione does not know about the troll . They head off to warn her and come upon the troll . Unwittingly , they lock it in Durmstrang 's bathroom only to realise that Hermione is trapped in there with the troll . Using teamwork , magic , and a lot of luck , the two of them manage to knock out the troll . Minerva finds them and begins to scold the boys .

Hermione interjects that Harry and Ronald were looking for her . She then lies , saying that she went to face the troll herself and that Ronald and Harry had been trying to save her from it . At this point , Hermione befriends them .
As November begins , so does the Quidditch season , and Harry is about to play in his first match against Slytherin .

To prepare , Harry borrows a book entitled Quidditch Through the Ages from Hermione . Professor Snape discovers Ronald , Harry , and Hermione out with the book one evening and confiscates it from Harry on the feeble pretext that library books may not be taken outside of the school .
Harry 's suspicions of Severus continue to grow . Harry starts to notice that Severus is limping .

Going off to retrieve the book from Severus , Harry overhears Severus talking to Argus about the fact that the three-headed dog has attacked him , leaving a cut on his leg , which makes Harry even more suspicious .
The next morning , the Quidditch match begins .
Harry spots the Golden early in the game , and is flying toward it when the Marcus pushes him out of the way and is penalised .
Later in the game , Harry 's broom begins jerking uncontrollably . Hagrid comments that only Dark magic could make a broomstick so hard to manage .

Hermione notices that Severus is staring at Harry and muttering to himself , signs of casting a curse . As two of Harry 's teammates , the Weasley twins , try to rescue Harry in the air , Hermione rushes over to Severus in such a hurry that she knocks Quirinus over , sneaks behind Severus , and sets his robe on fire .
Suddenly , the spell on Harry 's broom is broken and Harry is once again in control .
He starts speeding toward the ground and lands , catching the Golden in his mouth and nearly swallowing it .

Rubeus takes Harry back to his hut with Hermione and Ronald , who tells Harry that Severus was putting a curse on his broomstick . Rubeus does not believe this , asking why Severus would try to kill Harry .
Harry tells Rubeus about Severus getting injured by the dog in the third-floor corridor .
Rubeus involuntarily reveals that the three-headed dog , Fluffy , is his , and that what the dog is guarding is a secret known only to Albus and a man named Nicolas .
Christmas is approaching .
Malfoy teases Harry about having to stay at Hogwarts for the holiday , as he does not have parents .

Harry , however , is looking forward to spending Christmas away from Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley , especially because Ronald is also staying at Hogwarts , as Mr and Mrs are going to visit Ronald 's older brother Charles in Rom .

The day before the holidays , Hermione tears Ronald and Harry away from a conversation with Hagrid to look in the library for more information about Nicolas . The librarian , Mary , catches Harry prowling around the restricted-books section of the library and kicks him out . On Christmas , Harry and Ronald awaken to presents , though Harry 's are fewer .
Harry receives a flute from Rubeus , a  pence coin from Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley , some fudge and Chocolate Frogs from Hermione , and a knitted jumper from Ronald 's mother .
He also receives an Invisibility cloak accompanied only by an anonymous note telling him that the cloak once belonged to Harry 's father and to `` use it well . ''

That night , after a satisfying Christmas dinner and after Ronald has fallen asleep , Harry tries on his Invisibility Cloak . Unseen , he is able to go to the library 's restricted-books section . But one of the books starts screaming when he opens it , so he quickly leaves .
He passes Argus and hides in an old classroom as Argus is getting Severus to help him search the corridors .
Inside stands an old mirror in a gold frame with the inscription `` Erised stra ehru oyt ube cafru oyt on wohsi '' -LRB- `` I show not your face , but your heart 's desire '' -RRB- .
Harry looks in the mirror and sees many people standing behind him , but when he turns around in the room , he sees no one .

Suddenly , he recognises that two of the people in the mirror are his dead mother and father . He tries to speak to them , but they can only communicate by waving . Harry lingers there a while but eventually returns to his room .
The next night , Harry brings Ronald with him to the mirror room .
Ronald does not see Harry 's parents in the mirror , but instead sees himself holding the Quidditch .
Mrs , Argus 's prowling cat , notices them .
On the third night , Ronald is afraid of being caught and does not want to go back , as he does not trust the mirror , so Harry returns alone .
There he finds Albus .
Albus explains to Harry that the mirror , which is known as the Mirror of Erised , displays the deepest desires of whoever looks into it .

Harry is relieved to find that Albus is not angry . However , he warns Harry that men have wasted away and been driven mad before the mirror and informs Harry that the mirror will be moved to a new location and tells him not to go looking for it .
When Harry asks what Albus sees in the mirror , his answer is `` himself holding a pair of socks . ''
Harry finds it hard to forget the image of his parents . Quidditch practise continues on even harder and it is revealed that Severus will referee the next match .
Malfoy performs a leg-locker curse on Neville , and to cheer him up , Harry tells Neville he is `` Worth twelve of Malfoy . ''

Harry suddenly remembers that he read the name Nicolas on a chocolate frog card , which reminds Hermione that she had seen the name in a book she picked up from the library , and the team discover that he was a famous alchemist who is the only known maker of the Philosopher 's Stone , whose powers include turning any metal to gold and producing the Elixir of Life , a potion that can make the drinker immortal.The Gryffindor versus Hufflepuff match arrives and Severus , who referees the match , is predictably biassed , while on the stands Ronald and Neville get into a scuffle with Malfoy , Vincent , and Gregory after Malfoy made some rude comments towards the players of their house 's team as well as both of them . Harry catches the snitch and wins the match under five minutes , though Ronald did not see this due to fighting Draco , and Neville is sent to the hospital wing due to the injuries he sustained from fighting both Vincent and Gregory . Later , Harry notices and follows Severus into the Forbidden by broomstick where he meets Quirinus and they speak of the Philosopher 's Stone . Harry thinks that Severus is trying to force Quirinus to help him get the stone so he can get rich , to the alarm of both Ronald and Hermione who fear Qurriell will talk . Harry , Ronald and Hermione meet with Rubeus , who confirms the Stone is being kept at Hogwarts . Hermione charms him into talking about the enchantments used to guard it : Fluffy , the three headed dog , is Rubeus 's , along with enchantments from Professors Sprout , Filius , Minerva , Quirinus , and Severus .
After this , Harry complains about the high temperature in Rubeus 's hut , only to discover he has a Norwegian Ridgeback dragon egg , which he names Norberta once it has hatched .
Malfoy , who has been spying then , discovers the dragon . To solve the problem , they convince Rubeus to send the dragon off to Ronald 's brother Charles .
Ronald 's hand is bitten by the dragon , and Ronald is sent off to Mary .

Harry and Hermione smuggle Norberta in a crate up to the tallest tower under Harry 's Invisibility cloak and on the way they see Minerva hauling Malfoy away to detention for being out of bed at night and speaking `` lies '' about Harry and a dragon .
They pass the crate off to Charles 's friends , and head back down the stairs , where they meet up with Argus , realising too late they have left the Invisibility Cloak behind .
Filch takes Harry and Hermione to Minerva 's office , where they meet Neville .
Minerva , very disappointed , takes  points each from the three of them and gives them all detention , which they will serve with Malfoy .
Their popularity with the other students suffers because of this .
A week or so before exams , Harry hears Quirinus , sounding as if he is being threatened .
So , Harry heads to the library to tell Ronald and Hermione .
They are convinced Severus was threatening Quirinus , and means to steal the Stone soon , and Hermione suggests they go to Albus .
Harry refuses , saying that they have no proof .
Harry , Hermione , and Neville receive notes from Minerva telling them their detention will begin at eleven that night .
Filch takes them out to the Forbidden , where Rubeus awaits to take them in to do a bit of investigating .
Hagrid shows them some silver unicorn blood , and says they need to find the unicorn that is hurt .
They split up , with Rubeus taking Harry and Hermione , and Neville and Malfoy going with Fang .
Rubeus encounters a few centaurs , named Ronan and Bane , but gets no useful information from them .

Suddenly , Rubeus sees red sparks in the air , signalling the other party is in trouble . He runs for them and returns , scolding Malfoy for startling Neville into sending up the sparks . Rubeus switches Harry and Neville , sending Harry off with Malfoy instead .
They eventually find the dead unicorn , and see something drinking its blood .

Malfoy screams and runs with Fang , leaving Harry , who is saved from the figure by a centaur , named Firenze , who tells Harry that unicorn blood can keep you alive , even if you are an inch from death , but curses you with a half-life in the process .
He then reveals that the person who was drinking it was doing so to remain alive until they were able to drink the Elixir of Life and wants the Stone .
He also asks Harry if he would not know anyone who has been waiting for years to regain power and Harry realises that the mysterious figure was a weakened but still alive Tom .
Back in the common room , Harry tells Hermione and Ron Voldemort 's in the forest and that Severus wants the Stone to help Tom restore his powers .

Afterwards , going into his bed , Harry finds that his Invisibility Cloak has been returned to him . After finishing their exams , Harry realises the suspicious coincidence in Rubeus wanting a dragon more than anything else , only to meet a stranger who had one to give him . He , Ronald , and Hermione run to ask him about the man who gave Norberta to him , and he says he never saw his face because he kept his hood up .
Rubeus also mentions that they talked about Hogwarts and Fluffy the three-headed dog .
He also mentions that the stranger gave him drinks while getting information out of him .
Rubeus lets it slip how to get past Fluffy , which sends Harry , Ronald and Hermione off .
They head for Albus 's office , only to see Minerva , who tells them he has left for London .
After Harry reveals that they know about the Stone , Minerva insists no one could steal the Stone .
The trio realise that Albus has been lured away and that Severus 's going after the Stone that night so they decide to head out that night to try to get it themselves .

After Hermione curses Neville in a Full Body-Bind Curse for refusing to allow them to leave , they head up to the third floor room , and start their intense trip into the seven Philosopher 's Stone Chambers .
They find the door ajar , and a harp on the floor .
Harry plays the flute Rubeus got him for Christmas , and Fluffy goes back to sleep .
They head down through the trapdoor . They land in Professor Sprout 's room , full of Devil 's Snare , which almost smothers them before Hermione lights a fire and drives it off .
The next room , Professor Flitwick 's , holds a bunch of flying keys and some broomsticks .
Harry finds a silver one with a broken wing that is different from the others and catches it , unlocking the next door with it .
The next room is Minerva 's , and has a large chessboard , for a game of Wizard 's Chess that Ronald helps them win , at the cost of having to sacrifice himself and getting knocked out .

Harry and Hermione continue to the next room , Quirinus 's , where they find an unconscious troll laying on the floor . Lastly , they enter Professor Snape 's room , and find seven potions in bottles along with a roll of paper giving clues on which one to drink to continue , noting that three bottles have poison , two have nettle wine , one will send the drinker back , and the other will let the drinker move forward into the next room . Hermione tells Harry that it is a test of logic and not magic wherein most wizards fail . She solves the puzzle , and at Harry 's instruction , drinks the one that will allow her to head back through the purple flame , while Harry drinks the one to head into the black flame and into the final room , where he is surprised at who he sees .

It is Quirinus who Harry sees in the room , not Severus . Harry , astonished , hears Quirinus tell him that , next to Severus , no one would expect him to try to steal the Stone and that Severus was actually protecting Harry . Harry notices the Mirror of Erised , and Quirinus stops to examine it , saying it is the key to getting the Stone . To distract him from the Mirror , Harry questions Quirinus , who says he is serving Tom , and although Severus hated Harry because of his father , he never wanted Harry dead . He explains how Severus and Harry 's father went to school together when they were younger , and how it was there where their hatred against each other started . Quirinus asks for help from his master to get the Stone , and a snake-like voice tells him to use the boy . Harry is told to look into the Mirror . He sees his reflection pull the Stone out of his pocket and put it back in , and Harry feels it drop into his own pocket . He tells Quirinus that he sees himself shaking hands with Dumbledore , after winning the House Cup for Gryffindor . The snake-like voice tells Quirrell Harry is lying and Quirinus takes his turban off to show Harry what lies on the back of his head .
As Quirinus turns around , Harry is shocked to see another face where the back of Quirinus 's head should be .
The face has red eyes and a snake-like slit where the nose should be .

Harry realises this is the face of Tom and Tom demands Harry give him the Stone . Harry refuses and runs , but Quirinus seizes him . However , the contact with Harry 's skin burns Quirinus and causes him to have boils all over the area in which Harry touched him .
Harry grabs Quirinus 's face , then Quirinus 's arm , and holds on , with the blinding pain in Quirinus 's head building , until Quirinus feels the arm wrenched away before Quirinus blacks out .
He awakes in the hospital wing with Dumbledore there , telling him Quirinus did not succeed at getting the Stone , and indeed the Stone has been destroyed .
In spite of this , there are other ways in which Tom can return .
He can not be killed , and he left Quirinus to die .

Albus explains the reason why Quirinus could not touch Harry was because Harry 's mother had died to save him , protecting him with her love . Harry also told Albus about what Quirinus mentioned to him earlier regarding Severus hating Harry due to hatred for his father . Albus responds that Severus was only grudgingly protecting Harry this year to pay off a debt he owed due to James saving his life during their Hogwarts years .

Harry then receives a visit from Ronald and Hermione , who reveal that Slytherin came in first for the House Cup and , with Harry unable to play in the championship Quidditch match , Ravenclaw easily won the match , before Mary forces them out .

Hagrid shows up later and gives Harry Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley .

The following day , at the end of term feast , Albus awards some last-minute points for the recent events . He gives Ronald and Hermione fifty points each , and Harry sixty , which places them in a tie with Slytherin for first place . Albus then recognises that while it is hard to stand up to enemies , it is even harder to stand up to friends as Neville did , and he awards Neville  more points , which was the most house points Neville had ever gotten .
This puts Gryffindor in the lead and the winners of the House Cup , too much rejoicing from everyone but Slytherin-Salazar .
Not only were Gryffindor students happy , but Hufflepuff and Ravenclaw were happy to see Slytherins down fall .
Soon , their trunks are all packed , and they take the Hogwarts back towards the muggle world.Harry , Ronald and Hermione all say their goodbyes before heading home .
